title: GitHub MCP Server
description: Interact with GitHub repositories, issues, pull requests, and more

tools_provided.name: create_or_update_file
tools_provided.description: Create or update a file in a repository

tools_provided.name: get_file_contents
tools_provided.description: Get contents of a file from a repository

tools_provided.name: push_files
tools_provided.description: Push multiple files to a repository

tools_provided.name: add_issue_comment
tools_provided.description: Add a comment to an issue

tools_provided.name: get_issue
tools_provided.description: Get details of a specific issue

tools_provided.name: get_pull_request
tools_provided.description: Get details of a specific pull request

tools_provided.name: list_pull_requests
tools_provided.description: List pull requests in a repository

tools_provided.name: create_pull_request_review
tools_provided.description: Create a review on a pull request

tools_provided.name: get_pull_request_files
tools_provided.description: Get files changed in a pull request

tools_provided.name: get_pull_request_status
tools_provided.description: Get status checks for a pull request

required_env.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
required_env.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with repo scope

setup_instructions: Create a GitHub Personal Access Token at https://github.com/settings/tokens
Grant 'repo' scope for full repository access
Set the token as GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable
notes: Requires a GitHub Personal Access Token
Rate limits apply based on GitHub API limits
